Sentencas: The evolution of Co coating in solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) under low and medium temperatures (<700 & DEG;C) is different from that under high temperatures.
Titulo: Experimental Investigation of the Initial Stage of the Oxidation Mechanism of Co Coating for Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Interconnects at 650 °C

Sentencas: In this context, the oxidation corrosion of 441 ferritic stainless steel (FSS) with a Co coating in air under 650 & DEG;C was investigated.
Titulo: Experimental Investigation of the Initial Stage of the Oxidation Mechanism of Co Coating for Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Interconnects at 650 °C

Sentencas: The results indicated that the Co coating was oxidized rapidly and a Co3O4 spinel layer formed in the initial exposure of 5 min, which improved the oxidation resistance of 441 steel.
Titulo: Experimental Investigation of the Initial Stage of the Oxidation Mechanism of Co Coating for Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Interconnects at 650 °C

Sentencas: After oxidation at 650 & DEG;C for 120 h, a Cr2O3 layer with a thickness of 0.2-0.4 & mu;m was observed on the surface of bare 441 steel, while the surface oxide scale of Co-coated 441 steel samples was composed of an inner Cr2O3 and Fe2O3 solid solution (0.1-0.3 & mu;m thick), an intermediate (Fe, Co)(3)O-4 layer and an outer Co3O4 spinel layer, respectively.
Titulo: Experimental Investigation of the Initial Stage of the Oxidation Mechanism of Co Coating for Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Interconnects at 650 °C

Sentencas: The Co-coated 441 steel sample exhibited better electrical properties.
Titulo: Experimental Investigation of the Initial Stage of the Oxidation Mechanism of Co Coating for Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Interconnects at 650 °C

Sentencas: After oxidation at 650 & DEG;C for 120 h, the area-specific resistance (ASR) of the Co-coated steel was 3.73 m & omega;& BULL;cm(2), which was 25.4% lower than that of bare 441 steel as 5 m & omega;& BULL;cm(2).
Titulo: Experimental Investigation of the Initial Stage of the Oxidation Mechanism of Co Coating for Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Interconnects at 650 °C

Sentencas: Furthermore, the thermal growth process and protection mechanism of Co coating at 650 & DEG;C were discussed.
Titulo: Experimental Investigation of the Initial Stage of the Oxidation Mechanism of Co Coating for Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Interconnects at 650 °C
